content.description: While the book mentions this route as comparable to BeeGee at Pinnacle Peak, the only similarities might be that it is a crack and there is a hive near the top.  The first day we were here the bee's were active, on a second visit there was no activity (visits were about a month apart, November and December).Never "radically overhung" but radical nonetheless.  Committing moves off the deck yields to an awkward pod stance and perfect jams and nice movement.A neat climb that rewards those that make the trek to the far side of this spire.
content.location: This route is on the north side of the third Jacuzzi Spire.  Nice saddle and belay spot.

content.description: The upmost spire of the trio that is easily reached by hiking along the east side.  Home to several routes.
